00018 #ifndef _SITECALCULATOR_H
00019 #define _SITECALCULATOR_H
00020 
00021 #include "qmcalculator.h"
00022 
00023 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00024 
00025 class SiteCalculator : public QMCalculator{
00026 public:
00027     SiteCalculator();
00028     virtual ~SiteCalculator();
00029 
00030     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00031     virtual void EvaluateSite(QMCrgUnit *crg) {};
00032 };
00033 
00034 inline bool SiteCalculator::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top){
00035     vector<QMCrgUnit*>& crglist = top.CrgUnits();
00036     for(vector<QMCrgUnit*>::iterator iter = crglist.begin();iter!=crglist.end();++iter)
00037         EvaluateSite(*iter);
00038     return true;
00039 }
00040 
00041 }}
00042 
00043 #endif  /* _SITECALCULATOR_H */
